bioghist.p: William Morris Maier (1909-1982) was a Haverford College alumnus, class of 1931. He served on the Haverford College Board of Managers and as Treasurer of the Haverford College Corporation. He was a member of the Haverford Monthly Meeting.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of financial records, correspondence, meeting minutes, and printed materials related to Quaker and philanthropic concerns with which William Morris Maier was involved. These include the Friends Freedmen's Association, Ludwick Institute, Friends Fiduciary Corporation, the Philadelphia Yearly Meeting (including the Representative Meeting), the Richard Humphreys Foundation, University Settlements, Cheyney State College, and the Emlen Institute.
